4cfb1737-d90d-4217-b003-b561dcca626f.subject: 🚀 Sprint 1 Officially Launched - Next.js Todo List Application
4cfb1737-d90d-4217-b003-b561dcca626f.content:
**SPRINT 1 LAUNCH NOTIFICATION**

The development phase for our Next.js Todo List Application is now officially underway!

**Sprint 1 Goals:**
• Establish technical foundation with Next.js + TypeScript
• Deliver 4 core user stories (16 story points)
• Set up development workflows and quality processes
• Create working todo list management functionality

**Key Deliverables:**
✅ PBI-001: Create Todo List (5 pts)
✅ PBI-002: View Todo Lists Dashboard (3 pts)  
✅ PBI-003: Edit Todo List Name (3 pts)
✅ PBI-004: Delete Todo List (5 pts)

**Immediate Actions:**
1. **Tech-lead:** Begin Next.js project setup immediately
2. **All developers:** Attend Sprint 1 kickoff meeting today
3. **Daily standups:** Start tomorrow at 9:00 AM
4. **Code reviews:** Within 4 hours of PR submission

**Resources:**
📋 Sprint 1 Kickoff Plan: docs/sprint-1-kickoff-plan.md
📊 Product Backlog: docs/product-backlog.md
🏗️ Technical Architecture: docs/system-architecture-enhanced.md

**Sprint Timeline:** 2 weeks (ends Sept 3, 2025)
**Success Criteria:** All stories completed, foundation ready for Sprint 2

Let's build something amazing! 🎯
